bio.title: David Robinson
bio.description: David Maurice Robinson is an American former professional basketball player who played for the San Antonio Spurs in the National Basketball Association from 1989 to 2003, and minority owner of the San Antonio Spurs.
bio.children: Justin Robinson, David Robinson, Jr., Corey Robinson
bio.education: University of the Incarnate Word (2011),  More
